answers.answer: Most of the time by very high blood pressure and excessive swelling.
Normally your blood pressure would be high and you would have protein in your urine. They would do a 24hour urine test for protein and draw some blood too.

hi, its usually dectcted in a number of ways,urinalysis-protein, high blood pressure and raised liver enzymes in a blood test.how many weeks pregnant are you??do you have headaches, blurred vision and heart burn?? all symptoms of pre eclampsia
